type.title: Black tea
type.comment: Black tea is green tea that has been oxidized, therefore he contains more theine. His steeping time is quite short.

tasks.comment: Add water in a pot and let it boil over high heat
Turn off the heat of the pot, then put the tea bag inside it and let it infuse on its own

type.title: Green tea
type.comment: Green tea is a tea that haven't been oxidized. He got some health benefits and his steeping time is quite short.

tasks.title: Add water
tasks.comment: Add water in a pot and let it boil over high heat

tasks.title: Let it infuse
tasks.comment: Turn off the heat of the pot, then put the tea bag inside it and let it infuse on its own

type.title: White tea
type.comment: White tea is a tea that has been slightly oxidized (approximately 12% of oxydation). This tea is usually quite expensive and is known for its diet benefits. His steeping time is long.

tasks.title: Add water
tasks.comment: Add water in a pot and let it boil over high heat

tasks.title: Let it infuse
tasks.comment: Turn off the heat of the pot, then put the tea bag inside it and let it infuse on its own

type.title: Rooibos
type.comment: Rooibos is a tea that comes from the South of Africa, that does not contain theine. He is known for its benefits on one's digestion, sleep or allergies. His steeping time is average.

tasks.title: Add water
tasks.comment: Add water in a pot and let it boil over high heat

tasks.title: Let it infuse
tasks.comment: Turn off the heat of the pot, then put the tea bag inside it and let it infuse on its own.

type.title: Oolong
type.comment: Oolong tea is a tea which its oxydation is incomplete but it varies depending on the tea (from 10 to 80% of oxydation). It is between the black tea and the green one. His steeping time is average.

tasks.title: Add water
tasks.comment: Add water in a pot and let it boil over high heat

tasks.title: Let it infuse
tasks.comment: Turn off the heat of the pot, then put the tea bag inside it and let it infuse on its own

type.title: Hard-boiled egg
type.comment: Hard-boiled egg, white and yolk are coagulated

tasks.title: Gently dip the egg with a spoon or fork
Count about 10 minutes of cooking before leaving the water
Place the egg in cold water to cool it
Peel the eggs in cold water (easier)

type.title: Boiled egg
type.comment: The white is barely coagulated and the yolk remains liquid

tasks.title: Gently dip the egg with a spoon or fork
Count about 3 minutes of cooking before leaving the water
Peel or tap the top egg, salt, pepper

type.title: The soft-boiled egg
type.comment: The white is coagulated and the yolk remains runny, creamy

tasks.title: Gently dip the egg with a spoon or fork
Count about 5 minutes 45 sec of cooking before leaving the water
Put the egg in water cold to stop the cooking
Peel the eggs in cold water (easier)
